member.name: T:AutoFixture.AutoMoqAttribute
member.summary: Adds an AutoFixture customization that automatically generates mocked dependencies.

member.name: P:AutoFixture.AutoMoqAttribute.ConfigureMembers
member.summary: Specifies whether members of a mock will be automatically setup to retrieve the return values from a fixture.

member.name: P:AutoFixture.AutoMoqAttribute.GenerateDelegates
member.summary:
If value is true, delegate requests are intercepted and created by Moq.
Otherwise, if value is false, delegates are created by the AutoFixture kernel.
